name: Place Your Bets
description:
To play you place a bet.

 When the round starts, dice men will begin to run towards the goal in the center of the map. 

Rules: 

- Each dice man has a value displayed beneath him. If the dice man makes it to the blue goal his value will be added to your roll(score), and your number of rolls for that round will decrease. 

- When you run out of rolls you want your roll(score) to match your bet.

- The round will continue until you have used all your rolls. 

- If you click a dice man and drag him off the map, his value will reset to something new.
